name: UpdateOnCallSchedule
description:
Update an existing on-call schedule in Datadog.

Use this tool to update the details of an existing on-call schedule in Datadog. It should be called when there is a need to modify the configuration or timing of an on-call schedule.

parameters.name: schedule_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the on-call schedule to update in Datadog.

parameters.name: schedule_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the updated schedule details, including attributes like name, time zone, and layers. It includes information about relationships and the schedule ID.

effective_date.description: When this updated layer takes effect (ISO 8601 format).

end_date.description: When this updated layer should stop being active (ISO 8601 format).

id.description: A unique identifier for the layer being updated.

days.description: The number of days in each rotation cycle.

seconds.description: Any additional seconds for the rotation cycle (up to 30 days).

interval.description: Defines how often the rotation repeats, using a combination of days and optional seconds. Should be at least 1 hour.

user.description: Identifies the user participating in this layer as a single object with an `id`.

members.description: The members assigned to this layer.

name.description: The name for this layer (for example, "Secondary Coverage").

end_time.description: Specifies the ending time for this restriction.

start_time.description: Specifies the starting time for this restriction.

restrictions.description: Any time restrictions that define when this layer is active.

rotation_start.description: The date/time at which the rotation begins (ISO 8601 format).

layers.description: The updated list of layers (rotations) for this schedule.

name.description: A short name for the schedule.

time_zone.description: The time zone used when interpreting rotation times.

attributes.description: Defines the updatable attributes for a schedule, such as name, time zone, and layers.

id.description: The ID of the schedule to be updated.
The unique identifier of the team in this relationship.

data.description: An array of team references for this schedule.

teams.description: Associates teams with this schedule in a data structure.

relationships.description: Houses relationships for the schedule update, typically referencing teams.

data.description: Contains all data needed to update an existing schedule, including its attributes (such as name and time zone) and any relationships to teams.

parameters.name: relationships_to_include
parameters.description: Comma-separated relationships to return, e.g., `teams`, `layers`. Allowed values: `teams`, `layers`, `layers.members`, `layers.members.user`.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of included relationships to be returned. Allowed values: `teams`, `layers`, `layers.members`, `layers.members.user`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of included relationships to be returned. Allowed values: `teams`, `layers`, `layers.members`, `layers.members.user`.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of included relationships to be returned. Allowed values: `teams`, `layers`, `layers.members`, `layers.members.user`.

end_date.description: When this updated layer should stop being active (ISO 8601 format).

members.description: The members assigned to this layer.

name.description: The name for this layer (for example, "Secondary Coverage").

end_time.description: Specifies the ending time for this restriction.

start_time.description: Specifies the starting time for this restriction.

restrictions.description: Any time restrictions that define when this layer is active.

rotation_start.description: The date/time at which the rotation begins (ISO 8601 format).

layers.description: The updated list of layers (rotations) for this schedule.

name.description: A short name for the schedule.

time_zone.description: The time zone used when interpreting rotation times.

attributes.description: Defines the updatable attributes for a schedule, such as name, time zone, and layers.

data.description: An array of team references for this schedule.

teams.description: Associates teams with this schedule in a data structure.
